todos.text: Reply to Carla Reeves regarding homeowner's insurance quote request
todos.notes:
Good Morning Carla,

Thanks for your patience.  I currently do not have an option for homeowners new business, unless it is written with a Non-Admitted Carrier. 

In order for a non-admitted carrier to take on the risk, your current policy (PSIC) would have to be non-renewing you in the next 30 days or PSIC is requiring you to get a California Fair Plan policy. 

Since your Pacific Specialty policy is not with my agency, I can not see the status.  

Please let me know if any of the above is being imposed on you by Pacific Specialty.

Best,
Derrick

rom: BEALER, DERRICK
Sent: Tuesday, December 30, 2025 10:49 AM
To: wendyino@sbcglobal.net <wendyino@sbcglobal.net>
Cc: SOLIS, SEFRA <sefrasolis@allstate.com>
Subject: ALLSTATE- Requested Quotes

todos.transcription: Hello, Derek. This is Wendy Eno. We had a conversation yesterday. I was looking for some insurance quotes for home and auto, and you had let me know you'd get back to me by the end of day yesterday, and I haven't heard anything via phone or email, and I'm just not sure if I was forgotten. So if you could give me a call and let me know what those quotes are, just call me so that we can talk about it. My phone number is 408-315-0665, and it was regarding a bundle of home and auto. My house is in Goleta. It's a townhouse. I talked to you yesterday morning. You were going to pull some stuff together and get it back to me by end of day, so I'm just a little concerned. Okay.

todos.notes:
December 23, 2025
To Whom it May Concern,
The attached document was received at Allstate Insurance.  Unfortunately, the correspondence does not provide an itemized receipt.  Please resubmit the fax with a detailed itemized receipt that contains the date of service, name, vehicle and charges for the services rendered.   

If the document that you are faxing is not black and white, the fax will not come through clearly.  Please make a black and white copy of the document and fax again to 866-447-4293.

If you would prefer to mail the document.  Please send it to:

Allstate Insurance
P.O. Box 660636
Dallas, TX  75266



Thank You,


Allstate Insurance
Imaged Document Support Team

Document tree damage to trailer, house, and car
Start claim file for Speshock family
Investigate website issues preventing online claim filing

todos.transcription: Hello, Derek, this is Mike and Leanne Speshock. We wanted to start a claim. We had a tree fall on our trailer and our house and our car. And we've been trying for the last two hours to do this online. The website is not friendly and it's not letting us do anything. So we wanted to at least go on file so that we could start a claim. So if you could give us a call back at 805-453-8287 or 805-452-8858. Thank you, Derek. Look forward to hearing from you. We need some help. Thanks.

todos.text: Email copy of insurance policy to Kathryn Byrne

subtasks.text: Locate Kathryn Byrne's insurance policy in system
Verify customer information matches request details
Generate PDF copy of the policy
Compose email to kbyrne43@verizon.net with policy attachment
Send confirmation reply to Joseph Vaccaro that policy was sent

todos.notes:
________________________________________
From: BEALER, DERRICK <dbealer1@allstate.com>
Sent: Monday, January 12, 2026 9:06 AM
To: Kathryn Byrne <kbyrne43@verizon.net>
Cc: Joseph Vaccaro <jcvaccaro@yahoo.com>; SOLIS, SEFRA <sefrasolis@allstate.com>
Subject: Re: [EXTERNAL] Fw: Save money at renewal with autopay
 
Good Morning Kathryn, 

Thank you for reaching out.  I do not foresee any cancellations in your future.  I have yet to see any policy in my book get cancelled for a major claim.  Allstate really prides themselves on their claim process, team and overall standards.  There are always horror stories going around about insurance, so I appreciate you reaching out to me.  

Attached is your policy packet for your home. Please review it and let me know if you have any immediate questions.  

Also, I wanted to check in with you regarding the adjusters that have been assigned to your claim.  How have they been? Are they responsive to your requests and contact? Please let me know. 

Best,
Derrick

todos.transcription: Hi. This is Cynthia Nicholson. I'm calling in regards to my mom, Barbara Koval. I'm trying to get evidence of liability insurance. My nephew, Aiden Koval, is going to be driving my mom's car just for two weeks. And then I also needed help because the DMV wants proof of insurance and I need a smog it. So he's helping me do all that while he's visiting my mom. Could you call me back? My number is 805-801-2526. And I just saw that you did do something online. I figured out that, but I wanted to know why you backdated it to November. Could you please call me? 805-801-2526. Thank you.

todos.transcription: Hey, Derek. Joe Vaccaro calling for Catherine Byrne for 662 Puente Plaza. We're struggling with setting an account registration. That's what we have to do through MyClaims. We've reached out to one of the adjusters and we've reached out to the 800 number and neither can help us. We're getting an error code on the screen that's not allowing us to set up an account and I don't know what the option is. We're simply trying to set up, register the account and it's not allowing us and it doesn't seem that anyone from the 800 numbers or claims department can assist us. I'm wondering what to do. Thanks.

Emile,

Good Morning, 

I will have an answer from Burns & Wilcox today.  I am trying to get them to drop the Minimum Earned Premium of 25% on the new policy.  

I have sent them the docs you have sent over and hopefully we can get that 25% fee waived and your mortgagee over to your previous policy.  

The beginning of this year has been pretty busy and a little insane, apologies for not keeping you in the loop more.  

Rest assure this will be buttoned up this week.

Best,
Derrick

--- Added Content (1/7/2026, 2:35:04 PM) ---
Return call to Isala from Smart Financial about marketing services

Transcription:
Hi Derek, my name is Isala. I'm an account manager here at Smart Financial. Just reaching out to you regarding marketing for your office. I just wanted to touch base, see what your marketing plans are and how I can help grow your business. If you are, if you can, please give me a call when you have a moment. My phone number is 949-990-6326. Again, that's 949-990-6326. Thank you so much and I hope you have a great day.
todos.transcription: Hello, my name is Issa. I'm a front manager here at NetFinancial. Just reaching out to you regarding marketing and new generations for your office. I'm just wanting to touch base, see where your marketing plans are, and how I can help grow your business. With our real-time internet data needs and life call transfers, I also wanted to let you know about some promotions we're having. We are currently offering a $100 credit for anybody that signs back up with us that goes towards your first batch of leads. Direct phone number 949-990-6326. Again, that's 949-990-6326. Thank you so much, and I hope you have a great day.
